00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00023 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00024 #include <l4/re/video/colors>
00025 #include <l4/re/video/view>
00026 
00027 namespace L4Re { namespace Video {
00028 
00039 class L4_EXPORT Goos :
00040   public L4::Kobject_t<Goos, L4::Kobject, L4Re::Protocol::Goos>
00041 {
00042   L4_KOBJECT_DISABLE_COPY(Goos)
00043 
00044 public:
00046   enum Flags
00047   {
00048     F_auto_refresh    = 0x01, 
00049     F_pointer         = 0x02, 
00050     F_dynamic_views   = 0x04, 
00051     F_dynamic_buffers = 0x08, 
00052   };
00053 
00055   struct Info
00056   {
00057     unsigned long width;          
00058     unsigned long height;         
00059     unsigned flags;               
00060     unsigned num_static_views;    
00061     unsigned num_static_buffers;  
00062     Pixel_info pixel_info;        
00063 
00066     bool auto_refresh() const { return flags & F_auto_refresh; }
00068     bool has_pointer() const { return flags & F_pointer; }
00070     bool has_dynamic_views() const { return flags & F_dynamic_views; }
00072     bool has_dynamic_buffers() const { return flags & F_dynamic_buffers; }
00073   };
00074 
00080   int info(Info *) const throw();
00081 
00088   int get_static_buffer(unsigned idx, L4::Cap<L4Re::Dataspace> rbuf) const throw();
00089 
00096   int create_buffer(unsigned long size, L4::Cap<L4Re::Dataspace> rbuf) const throw();
00097 
00103   int delete_buffer(unsigned idx) const throw();
00104 
00110   int create_view(View *view) const throw();
00111 
00117   int delete_view(View const &v) const throw();
00118 
00124   View view(unsigned index) const throw();
00125 
00129   int refresh(int x, int y, int w, int h) throw();
00130 };
00131 
00132 inline View
00133 Goos::view(unsigned index) const throw()
00134 { return View(cap(), index); }
00135 
00136 }}
